description: Tomato, spinach, fetta, tasty and parmesan cheese, roasted pumpkin cubes and kalamata olives in a wholemeal scroll perfect for afternoon or morning tea.
name: Mediterranean Savoury Scrolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp crushed garlic (mix with tomato paste)
1 cup small pumpkin, diced (roasted with olive oil sea salt and black pepper)
0.5 cup milk (to mix to a soft dough, dont over mix)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, place parmesan butter and flour with basil and rub with your fingertips until resembles coarse breadcrumbs.
Add milk to mix to a soft dough, don't overmix.
Using a floured bench, place the dough down and scatter a small amount of extra flour sprinkled over it use a piece of baking paper and a rolling pin, roll out to a rectangle about 2 cm thick.
Remove baking paper and spread with tomato paste, sprinkle evenly with all other ingredients.
Roll lengthways tightly into a long scroll, give the log a bit of a roll on your bench to ensure it is not going to break apart on you.
Cut into 3cm slices about 1 cm apart on a greased baking sheet, bake in preheated oven 140°c normal or 150°fan forced for approximately 1518 minutes or until well risen and golden, serve warm.
